item.title: Equestrian team gallop to victory
item.author: Ilse Daly,
item.description: Imperial’s equestrian first team got the new season off to a cracking start by beating rivals Oxford, LSE and Brunel. The first competition of the year, hosted by Brunel, saw plenty of friendly rivalry between the universities. The Dressage phase gave club Chair, Andre Wilmes, a chance to show his …
